full_summary:
=====================================

**Tender Announcement:** 
=====================================

**Tender Reference:** WS4314220784

**Publication Date:** November 21, 2023

**Closing Date:** January 4, 2024, 14:00:00

**Request for Proposal #:** WS4314220784

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)

**Competitive Method:** Open bidding with multiple vendors

**Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity:** None

**Regions of Delivery:** St. Anthony

**Contracting Authority:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**End User:** Department of Transport (TC)

**Procurement Description:**

The Department of Transport (TC) invites bids for the supply and delivery of 1 Snow Basket Attachment. The successful bidder will be required to meet the following specifications:

 * Category: Truck tractors
 * UNSPSC Code: 25102100
 * Description: Snow Basket Attachment

**Submission Requirements:**

* Interested parties must submit their bids electronically through the Ariba Discovery platform.
* Bidders are required to provide a detailed proposal that includes the following:
	+ Technical specifications
	+ Pricing
	+ Delivery schedule
	+ Warranty information
	+ Support and maintenance services
* Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation.

**Contact Information:**

Shawn Trahan
Contracting Authority
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Email: [shawn.trahan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:shawn.trahan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Phone: (Please note: no phone number is provided)
Fax: (Please note: no fax number is provided)

**Links:**

* Ariba Discovery Platform: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18070526?extsite=MTgwNzA1MjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Submission Deadline:** January 4, 2024, 14:00:00 ET

Please note that late submissions will not be accepted. The evaluation process will begin immediately after the closing date. All questions and concerns should be directed to the Contracting Authority. 

Word Count: 394
